styles.name: American Traditional
styles.description: Classic American style with bold lines, solid colors and iconic designs like roses, hearts and eagles.

styles.name: Japanese (Irezumi)
styles.description: Traditional Japanese art with dragons, koi, cherry blossoms and nature elements in flowing compositions.

styles.name: Blackwork
styles.description: Tattoos done exclusively in black ink, from tribal designs to complex geometric patterns.

styles.name: Realism
styles.description: Tattoos that replicate reality with photographic precision, including portraits, animals and objects.

styles.name: Geometric
styles.description: Designs based on geometric shapes, sacred patterns and mathematical symmetry.

styles.name: Minimalist
styles.description: Simple and elegant designs with clean lines and elements reduced to their essence.

styles.name: Fine Line
styles.description: Delicate tattoos made with very fine lines, perfect for subtle and elegant designs.

styles.name: Neo-traditional
styles.description: Evolution of traditional style with more colors, advanced shading and more complex designs.

styles.name: Dotwork
styles.description: Technique that uses dots to create shading, textures and unique patterns.

styles.name: Biomechanical
styles.description: Fusion of organic and mechanical elements, creating the illusion of machines under the skin.

popular_combinations.name: Geometric Blackwork
popular_combinations.description: Combination of geometric patterns in pure black ink

popular_combinations.name: Realism with Fine Line
popular_combinations.description: Realistic portraits with fine line details
